## hpr3393 :: We need to talk about XML

 Klaatu introduces XML.

The sample XML document discussed in this episode is:



<xml>
  <sol>
    <planet>
      <name>
        Mercury
      </name>
      <albedo>
        0.11
      </albedo>
    </planet>
    <planet>
      <name>
        Venus
      </name>
      <albedo>
        0.7
      </albedo>
    </planet>
    <planet>
      <name>
        Terra
      </name>
      <albedo>
        0.39
      </albedo>
    </planet>
  </sol>
</xml>
